Summon_Demonlings.help: You summon demons to assist you in battle.

Summon_Demon_Prince.help: You summon a demon prince to assist you in battle.

Hell_on_Earth.help: You improve a demon pet's damage and chance to hit. The pet is also wreathed in Living Hellfire, which will occasionally create beings of fire to attack your enemies.

Forge.help: You significantly enhance a single ally's damage potential and chance to hit.
Forge.attackerHit: You greatly increase the Damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest}.
Forge.victimHit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your Damage and chance to hit.

Melt_Armor.help: You target a location and dramatically heat the air, melting any protections on targets caught within the area. Affected targets suffer reduced defense and resistance.
Melt_Armor.targetHelp: Your defense against and resistance to all types of damage has been reduced.
Melt_Armor.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Defense and Damage Resistance of {PlayerDest}.
Melt_Armor.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Defense and Damage Resistance.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} channels energy from another dimension into you in order to {PowerName}, reducing any protection you may have against damage.

Cauterize.help: You cauterize the wounds of a targeted ally, healing them.
